description: This file defines a React functional component named Atom, which renders an SVG with a circular gradient. It utilizes hooks like useState and useVideoConfig from 'react' and 'remotion' respectively, and dynamically generates a gradient ID to ensure uniqueness.

methods.name: Atom
methods.description: React functional component that renders a scalable SVG circle with a gradient fill, which uses props scale, color1, and color2, and employs hooks for configuration and state management.
